Eatery

Friends of the Earth Food Co-op & Cafe

312 Smith Street, Collingwood, Melbourne, Victoria, Australia

Website Email +61 3 9417 4382

Part of the Friends of the Earth Co-op, the cafe cooks organic vegan lunch bowls, pies, and pizzas and composts its kitchen waste.
